channel.title: Need help in my client
channel.description:
hey all, i download source with client and i changed every thing i want i downloaded no-ip and all are true but the server keep offline to other ppl that mean that the serve is at ip 127.0.0.1 but i dont know how to change it my problem is that it keeps offline and i dont know why!!!
so if you want to help me just tell me how to do it onlline
[q] how i know its offline [a] my friends tried to log into it but :\
images:
my client: [img]http://img141.imageshack.us/img141/1649/1stc.png[/img]
my no-ip [img]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/5980/2st.png[/img]
my problem:
[img]http://img140.imageshack.us/img140/9447/3stg.png[/img]

item.title: Need help in my client
item.dc:creator: @mkti1 mkti1
item.description:
@mkti1 wrote:

bird_:

You need to change the server IP in either client.java or egui.java.

egui.java are not found in my client but client.java i dont find in it 127.0.0.1 or 127.0

please help me i just want it to be onlline help me how to change my ip i tried 100 way none works

Read full topic

item.title: Need help in my client
item.dc:creator: @bird1 bird_
item.description:
@bird1 wrote:

You need to change the server IP in either client.java or egui.java.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help in my client
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

If they are unable to connect to your server through the client you either:
a) Didn’ t change the ip in the client
b) Didn’ t portforward correctly

Read full topic
